name: Retro Skies
description:
Description

Retro Skies is a Real-Time Strategy (RTS) game inspired by 90s era games of the same genre like "Red Alert", Starcraft and Age of Empires. The goal of the game is to defeat all other players in the map by making good use of strategic and economic management, as well as employing decisive tactics to out-maneuver your opponents. The game's visuals are meant to mimic retro style graphics and UI design

Premise

Take back control of the skies and enforce air superiority over your opponents in this action-packed, adrenaline pumping, wits demanding, RTS game. Build and command your fleet of airships to victory while defending your sky cities from rival factions. The skies or yours for the taking, Captain

Controls

-Camera Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys

-Zoom In/Out: Page Up/Down or Mouse Wheel

-Camera Rotation: Press Q and E

-Follow Unit: Space

-Camera Panning: Middle Mouse Button

-Hold & Place Building: (Hold) Left Shift

-Rotate To-Place Building (+): H

-Rotate To-Place Building (+): G

-Multiple Selection: (Hold) Left Control

-Selection: Left Mouse

-Task Assignment: Right Mouse

-Same-Type In Range Unit Selection: Left Mouse Double Click

-Assign Unit Group: 1 or 2 or 3 + Left Shift

-Select Unit Group: 1 or 2 or 3
